name: Mensagem Seguir Twitter no Final do Post
author: Conectando Net

sections.description: A simple plugin that adds a message at the end of each article asking users to follow us on Twitter and Facebook.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  2. Go to the Plugins page and activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
How do I use this plugin?

Head over to the WordPress admin area on your website and visit Plugins » Add New page.
You need to click on the ‘Upload Plugin’ button at the top to upload your plugin. This will show you the plugin upload box.

Go ahead and click on the Choose File button to select the zip file you just created. Next, click on the Install Now button to upload and install the plugin.

Once it’s installed, go ahead and activate the plugin.

How to uninstall the plugin?

Simply deactivate and delete the plugin.

short_description: This plugin allows you to automatically add the text "If you liked this article, then please follow us on Twitter and Facebook.
description: A simple plugin that adds a message at the end of each article asking users to follow us on Twitter and Facebook.
